title: Pixel XL WON'T Charge/Connect to PC
content: I decided to do Teardown & Reassembly  of my Perfectly working Pixel XL.  After Reassembly  everything WORKS except it WON'T Charge or Connect to PC. when i connect to computer i get No Notifications on the screen.  Replacing  the bottom charge board  did NOT help me. What went WRONG any suggestions?
